attributes.action: make washing machines at universities free
attributes.additional_details: it’s becomes very costly for uni students who don’t have a lot of money when at uni anyways, so paying £5 each time to get clothes cleaned and dried is a rip off
attributes.background: university students shouldn’t have to pay to use washing machines and should be included as part of their rent

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual institutions.
